Title: Removes the requirement of a sworn statement administered by a notary public for purposes of petitions
Summary: Removes the requirement of a sworn statement administered by a notary public for purposes of petitions; requires the notary public to inquire whether the person is the same listed on the address.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to removing the requirement of a sworn statement administered by a notary public for purposes of petitions
